00020 void reportTest(MultiQubit multiQubit, char testName[200]){
00021         printf("\nTest: %s\n", testName);
00022         reportStateToScreen(multiQubit, env, 0);
00023 }
00024 
00025 int compareReals(REAL a, REAL b, REAL precision){
00026         REAL diff = a-b;
00027         if (diff<0) diff *= -1;
00028         if (diff>precision) return 0;
00029         else return 1;
00030 }
00031 
00032 int test_initStateZero(char testName[200]){
00033         char filename[200];
00034         int passed=1;
00035         int count=1;
00036 
00037         int numQubits=3;
00038         MultiQubit mq, mqVerif; 
00039 
00040         createMultiQubit(&mq, numQubits, env);
00041         createMultiQubit(&mqVerif, numQubits, env);
00042 
00043         initStateZero(&mq);
00044 
00045         sprintf(filename, "%s%s%d.out", PATH_TO_TESTS, testName, count++);      
00046         initializeStateFromSingleFile(&mqVerif, filename, env);
00047 
00048         passed = compareStates(mq, mqVerif, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00049         destroyMultiQubit(mq, env);
00050         destroyMultiQubit(mqVerif, env);
00051 
00052         return passed;
00053 }

00078 int test_sigmaX(char testName[200]){
00079         char filename[200];
00080         int passed=1;
00081         int count=1;
00082 
00083         int numQubits=3;
00084         int rotateQubit;
00085         MultiQubit mq, mqVerif; 
00086 
00087         createMultiQubit(&mq, numQubits, env);
00088         createMultiQubit(&mqVerif, numQubits, env);
00089 
00090         for (int i=0; i<3; i++){
00091                 initStateDebug(&mq);
00092                 rotateQubit=i;
00093                 sigmaX(mq, rotateQubit);
00094                 
00095                 sprintf(filename, "%s%s%d.out", PATH_TO_TESTS, testName, count++);      
00096                 initializeStateFromSingleFile(&mqVerif, filename, env);
00097 
00098                 if (passed) passed = compareStates(mq, mqVerif, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00099         }
00100 
00101         destroyMultiQubit(mq, env);
00102         destroyMultiQubit(mqVerif, env);
00103 
00104         return passed;
00105 }

00249 int test_controlledNot(char testName[200]){

00260

00341 int test_compactUnitary(char testName[200]){
00342         int passed=1;
00343 
00344         int numQubits=10;
00345         int rotQubit;
00346         MultiQubit mq, mqVerif; 
00347 
00348         REAL angs[3];
00349         Complex alpha, beta;
00350 
00351     angs[0]=1.2; angs[1]=-2.4; angs[2]=0.3;
00352     alpha.real = cos(angs[0]) * cos(angs[1]);
00353     alpha.imag = cos(angs[0]) * sin(angs[1]);
00354     beta.real  = sin(angs[0]) * cos(angs[2]);
00355     beta.imag  = sin(angs[0]) * sin(angs[2]);
00356 
00357     createMultiQubit(&mq, numQubits, env);
00358     createMultiQubit(&mqVerif, numQubits, env);
00359 
00360     initStateDebug(&mq);
00361     initStateDebug(&mqVerif);
00362     for (int i=0; i<numQubits; i++){
00363         rotQubit=i;
00364         compactUnitary(mq, rotQubit, alpha, beta);
00365     }
00366     // note -- this is only checking if the state changed at all due to rotation,
00367     // not that it changed correctly
00368     if (passed) passed = !compareStates(mq, mqVerif, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00369 
00370 
00371     // Rotate back the other way and check we arrive back at the initial state
00372     alpha.real = alpha.real;
00373     alpha.imag = -alpha.imag;
00374     beta.real  = -beta.real;
00375     beta.imag  = -beta.imag;
00376 
00377     for (int i=numQubits-1; i>=0; i--){
00378         rotQubit=i;
00379         compactUnitary(mq, rotQubit, alpha, beta);
00380     }
00381 
00382         if (passed) passed = compareStates(mq, mqVerif, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00383 
00384         destroyMultiQubit(mq, env);
00385         destroyMultiQubit(mqVerif, env);
00386 
00387     // check for normalisation
00388     numQubits=25;
00389     createMultiQubit(&mq, numQubits, env);
00390     initStatePlus(&mq);
00391     for (int i=0; i<numQubits; i++){
00392         rotQubit=i;
00393         compactUnitary(mq, rotQubit, alpha, beta);
00394     }
00395     REAL outcome = calcTotalProbability(mq);    
00396     if (passed) passed = compareReals(1.0, outcome, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00397     destroyMultiQubit(mq, env);
00398 
00399 
00400         return passed;
00401 }
00402 
00403 int test_unitary(char testName[200]){
00404         int passed=1;
00405 
00406         int numQubits=10;
00407         int rotQubit;
00408         MultiQubit mq, mqVerif; 
00409 
00410         REAL angs[3];
00411         Complex alpha, beta;
00412     ComplexMatrix2 u, uDagger;
00413 
00414     angs[0]=1.2; angs[1]=-2.4; angs[2]=0.3;
00415     alpha.real = cos(angs[0]) * cos(angs[1]);
00416     alpha.imag = cos(angs[0]) * sin(angs[1]);
00417     beta.real  = sin(angs[0]) * cos(angs[2]);
00418     beta.imag  = sin(angs[0]) * sin(angs[2]);
00419 
00420     u.r0c0 = (Complex) {.real=alpha.real, .imag=alpha.imag};
00421     u.r0c1 = (Complex) {.real=-beta.real, .imag=beta.imag}; 
00422     u.r1c0 = (Complex) {.real=beta.real, .imag=beta.imag};
00423     u.r1c1 = (Complex) {.real=alpha.real, .imag=-alpha.imag};
00424 
00425     createMultiQubit(&mq, numQubits, env);
00426     createMultiQubit(&mqVerif, numQubits, env);
00427 
00428     initStateDebug(&mq);
00429     initStateDebug(&mqVerif);
00430     for (int i=0; i<numQubits; i++){
00431         rotQubit=i;
00432         compactUnitary(mqVerif, rotQubit, alpha, beta);
00433         unitary(mq, rotQubit, u);
00434     }
00435     // assigning alpha/beta values to u such that compactUnitary should match unitary
00436     if (passed) passed = compareStates(mq, mqVerif, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00437 
00438     // Rotate back the other way and check we arrive back at the initial state
00439     uDagger.r0c0.real=u.r0c0.real; uDagger.r0c0.imag=-u.r0c0.imag;
00440     uDagger.r0c1.real=u.r1c0.real; uDagger.r0c1.imag=-u.r1c0.imag;
00441     uDagger.r1c0.real=u.r0c1.real; uDagger.r1c0.imag=-u.r0c1.imag; 
00442     uDagger.r1c1.real=u.r1c1.real; uDagger.r1c1.imag=-u.r1c1.imag;
00443     
00444     for (int i=numQubits-1; i>=0; i--){
00445         rotQubit=i;
00446         unitary(mq, rotQubit, uDagger);
00447     }
00448 
00449     initStateDebug(&mqVerif);
00450         if (passed) passed = compareStates(mq, mqVerif, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00451 
00452         destroyMultiQubit(mq, env);
00453         destroyMultiQubit(mqVerif, env);
00454 
00455     // check for normalisation
00456     numQubits = 25;
00457     createMultiQubit(&mq, numQubits, env);
00458     initStatePlus(&mq);
00459     for (int i=0; i<numQubits; i++){
00460         rotQubit=i;
00461         unitary(mq, rotQubit, uDagger);
00462     }
00463     REAL outcome = calcTotalProbability(mq);    
00464     if (passed) passed = compareReals(1.0, outcome, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00465     destroyMultiQubit(mq, env);
00466 
00467         return passed;
00468 }

00470 int test_controlledCompactUnitary(char testName[200]){
00471         char filename[200];
00472         int passed=1;
00473         int count=1;
00474 
00475         int numQubits=3;
00476         int rotQubit, controlQubit;
00477         MultiQubit mq, mqVerif; 
00478 
00479         // assumes compactUnitary function is correct
00480         
00481         REAL ang1, ang2, ang3;
00482     ang1 = 1.2320;
00483     ang2 = 0.4230;
00484     ang3 = -0.65230;
00485 
00486         Complex alpha, beta;
00487         alpha.real = cos(ang1) * cos(ang2);
00488     alpha.imag = cos(ang1) * sin(ang2);
00489     beta.real  = sin(ang1) * cos(ang3);
00490     beta.imag  = sin(ang1) * sin(ang3);
00491 
00492         createMultiQubit(&mq, numQubits, env);
00493         createMultiQubit(&mqVerif, numQubits, env);
00494 
00495         for (int j=0; j<3; j++){
00496                 controlQubit=j;
00497                 for (int i=0; i<3; i++){
00498             if (i==j){count++; continue;}
00499                         initStateDebug(&mq);
00500                         rotQubit=i;
00501                         controlledCompactUnitary(mq, controlQubit, rotQubit, alpha, beta);
00502                         
00503                         sprintf(filename, "%s%s%d.out", PATH_TO_TESTS, testName, count++);      
00504                         initializeStateFromSingleFile(&mqVerif, filename, env);
00505 
00506                         if (passed) passed = compareStates(mq, mqVerif, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00507                 }
00508         }
00509         destroyMultiQubit(mq, env);
00510         destroyMultiQubit(mqVerif, env);
00511 
00512         return passed;
00513 }

00515 int test_controlledUnitary(char testName[200]){
00516         char filename[200];
00517         int passed=1;
00518         int count=1;
00519 
00520         int numQubits=10;
00521         int rotQubit, controlQubit;
00522 
00523     ComplexMatrix2 u;
00524         MultiQubit mq, mqVerif; 
00525 
00526         // assumes controlledCompactUnitary function is correct
00527         
00528         REAL ang1, ang2, ang3;
00529     ang1 = 1.2320;
00530     ang2 = 0.4230;
00531     ang3 = -0.65230;
00532 
00533         Complex alpha, beta;
00534         alpha.real = cos(ang1) * cos(ang2);
00535     alpha.imag = cos(ang1) * sin(ang2);
00536     beta.real  = sin(ang1) * cos(ang3);
00537     beta.imag  = sin(ang1) * sin(ang3);
00538 
00539     u.r0c0 = (Complex) {.real=alpha.real, .imag=alpha.imag};
00540     u.r0c1 = (Complex) {.real=-beta.real, .imag=beta.imag}; 
00541     u.r1c0 = (Complex) {.real=beta.real, .imag=beta.imag};
00542     u.r1c1 = (Complex) {.real=alpha.real, .imag=-alpha.imag};
00543 
00544         createMultiQubit(&mq, numQubits, env);
00545         createMultiQubit(&mqVerif, numQubits, env);
00546 
00547         for (int j=0; j<numQubits; j++){
00548                 controlQubit=j;
00549                 for (int i=0; i<numQubits; i++){
00550             if (j==i) continue;
00551                         initStateDebug(&mq);
00552                         initStateDebug(&mqVerif);
00553                         rotQubit=i;
00554                         controlledCompactUnitary(mqVerif, controlQubit, rotQubit, alpha, beta);
00555                         controlledUnitary(mq, controlQubit, rotQubit, u);
00556                         
00557                         if (passed) passed = compareStates(mq, mqVerif, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00558                 }
00559         }
00560     
00561         destroyMultiQubit(mq, env);
00562         destroyMultiQubit(mqVerif, env);
00563 
00564         return passed;
00565 }

00567 int test_multiControlledUnitary(char testName[200]){
00568         char filename[200];
00569         int passed=1;
00570         int count=1;
00571 
00572         int numQubits=10;
00573         int rotQubit, controlQubit;
00574     ComplexMatrix2 u;
00575         MultiQubit mq, mqVerif; 
00576 
00577         // assumes controlledCompactUnitary function is correct
00578         
00579         REAL ang1, ang2, ang3;
00580     ang1 = 1.2320;
00581     ang2 = 0.4230;
00582     ang3 = -0.65230;
00583 
00584         Complex alpha, beta;
00585         alpha.real = cos(ang1) * cos(ang2);
00586     alpha.imag = cos(ang1) * sin(ang2);
00587     beta.real  = sin(ang1) * cos(ang3);
00588     beta.imag  = sin(ang1) * sin(ang3);
00589 
00590     u.r0c0 = (Complex) {.real=alpha.real, .imag=alpha.imag};
00591     u.r0c1 = (Complex) {.real=-beta.real, .imag=beta.imag}; 
00592     u.r1c0 = (Complex) {.real=beta.real, .imag=beta.imag};
00593     u.r1c1 = (Complex) {.real=alpha.real, .imag=-alpha.imag};
00594 
00595         createMultiQubit(&mq, numQubits, env);
00596         createMultiQubit(&mqVerif, numQubits, env);
00597 
00598     // test mask contains one control qubit
00599         for (int j=0; j<numQubits; j++){
00600                 controlQubit=j;
00601                 for (int i=0; i<numQubits; i++){
00602             if (j==i) continue;
00603                         initStateDebug(&mq);
00604                         initStateDebug(&mqVerif);
00605                         rotQubit=i;
00606                         controlledCompactUnitary(mqVerif, controlQubit, rotQubit, alpha, beta);
00607                         multiControlledUnitary(mq, &controlQubit, 1, rotQubit, u);
00608                         
00609                         if (passed) passed = compareStates(mq, mqVerif, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00610                 }
00611         }
00612    
00613         destroyMultiQubit(mq, env);
00614         destroyMultiQubit(mqVerif, env);
00615 
00616     // randomly test a few different other multi control qubit masks 
00617     numQubits=4;
00618     int controlQubits[3];
00619         createMultiQubit(&mq, numQubits, env);
00620         createMultiQubit(&mqVerif, numQubits, env);
00621 
00622     rotQubit=3;
00623         controlQubits[0]=0;
00624         controlQubits[1]=2;
00625 
00626         initStateDebug(&mq);
00627         multiControlledUnitary(mq, controlQubits, 2, rotQubit, u);
00628     sprintf(filename, "%s%s%d.out", PATH_TO_TESTS, testName, count++);  
00629     initializeStateFromSingleFile(&mqVerif, filename, env);
00630         if (passed) passed = compareStates(mq, mqVerif, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00631 
00632     rotQubit=1;
00633         controlQubits[0]=0;
00634         controlQubits[1]=2;
00635         controlQubits[2]=3;
00636 
00637         initStateDebug(&mq);
00638         multiControlledUnitary(mq, controlQubits, 3, rotQubit, u);
00639     sprintf(filename, "%s%s%d.out", PATH_TO_TESTS, testName, count++);  
00640     initializeStateFromSingleFile(&mqVerif, filename, env);
00641         if (passed) passed = compareStates(mq, mqVerif, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00642 
00643         destroyMultiQubit(mq, env);
00644         destroyMultiQubit(mqVerif, env);
00645 
00646         return passed;
00647 }
00648 
00649 int test_findProbabilityOfOutcome(char testName[200]){
00650         int passed=1;
00651 
00652         int numQubits=12;
00653         MultiQubit mq; 
00654         int qubit;
00655         REAL outcome;
00656 
00657         createMultiQubit(&mq, numQubits, env);
00658 
00659         // test qubit = |0> 
00660         initStateZero(&mq);
00661         for (qubit=0; qubit<numQubits; qubit++){
00662                 outcome = findProbabilityOfOutcome(mq, qubit, 0);
00663                 if (passed) passed = compareReals(1, outcome, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00664 
00665                 outcome = findProbabilityOfOutcome(mq, qubit, 1);
00666                 if (passed) passed = compareReals(0, outcome, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00667         }
00668 
00669         // test qubit = |1> 
00670         for (qubit=0; qubit<numQubits; qubit++){
00671                 initStateOfSingleQubit(&mq, qubit, 1);
00672                 outcome = findProbabilityOfOutcome(mq, qubit, 0);
00673                 if (passed) passed = compareReals(0, outcome, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00674 
00675                 outcome = findProbabilityOfOutcome(mq, qubit, 1);
00676                 if (passed) passed = compareReals(1, outcome, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00677         }
00678 
00679         // test qubit = |+> 
00680         for (qubit=0; qubit<numQubits; qubit++){
00681                 initStatePlus(&mq);
00682                 outcome = findProbabilityOfOutcome(mq, qubit, 0);
00683                 if (passed) passed = compareReals(0.5, outcome, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00684 
00685                 outcome = findProbabilityOfOutcome(mq, qubit, 1);
00686                 if (passed) passed = compareReals(0.5, outcome, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00687         }
00688 
00689         destroyMultiQubit(mq, env);
00690 
00691         return passed;
00692 }
00693 
00694 int test_collapseToOutcome(char testName[200]){
00695         int passed=1;
00696 
00697         int numQubits=3;
00698         MultiQubit mq, mqVerif;
00699         int qubit;
00700         REAL prob;
00701 
00702         createMultiQubit(&mq, numQubits, env);
00703         createMultiQubit(&mqVerif, numQubits, env);
00704 
00705         // test qubit = |0> 
00706         for (qubit=0; qubit<numQubits; qubit++){
00707                 initStateZero(&mq);
00708                 initStateZero(&mqVerif);
00709                 prob = collapseToOutcome(mq, qubit, 0);
00710                 if (passed) passed = compareReals(1, prob, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00711                 if (passed) passed = compareStates(mq, mqVerif, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00712 
00713         /* uncomment to test error is thrown
00714                 initStateZero(&mq);
00715                 initStateZero(&mqVerif);
00716                 prob = collapseToOutcome(mq, qubit, 1);
00717                 if (passed) passed = compareReals(0, prob, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00718                 if (passed) passed = compareStates(mq, mqVerif, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00719         */
00720         }
00721 
00722         // test qubit = |1> 
00723         for (qubit=0; qubit<numQubits; qubit++){
00724         /* uncomment to test error is thrown
00725                 initStateOfSingleQubit(&mq, qubit, 1);
00726                 initStateOfSingleQubit(&mqVerif, qubit, 1);
00727                 prob = collapseToOutcome(mq, qubit, 0);
00728                 if (passed) passed = compareReals(0, prob, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00729                 if (passed) passed = compareStates(mq, mqVerif, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00730         */
00731 
00732                 initStateOfSingleQubit(&mq, qubit, 1);
00733                 initStateOfSingleQubit(&mqVerif, qubit, 1);
00734                 prob = collapseToOutcome(mq, qubit, 1);
00735                 if (passed) passed = compareReals(1, prob, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00736                 if (passed) passed = compareStates(mq, mqVerif, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00737         }
00738 
00739         // test qubit = |+> 
00740         for (qubit=0; qubit<numQubits; qubit++){
00741                 initStatePlus(&mq);
00742                 initStateOfSingleQubit(&mqVerif, qubit, 0);
00743                 prob = collapseToOutcome(mq, qubit, 0);
00744                 if (passed) passed = compareReals(0.5, prob, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00745                 if (passed) passed = compareStates(mq, mqVerif, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00746 
00747                 initStatePlus(&mq);
00748                 initStateOfSingleQubit(&mqVerif, qubit, 1);
00749                 prob = collapseToOutcome(mq, qubit, 1);
00750                 if (passed) passed = compareReals(0.5, prob, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00751                 if (passed) passed = compareStates(mq, mqVerif, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00752         }
00753         destroyMultiQubit(mq, env);
00754         destroyMultiQubit(mqVerif, env);
00755 
00756         return passed;
00757 }
00758 
00759 int test_measure(char testName[200]){
00760         int passed=1;
00761 
00762         int numQubits=4;
00763         MultiQubit mq, mqVerif;
00764         int qubit;
00765     int outcome;
00766 
00767         createMultiQubit(&mq, numQubits, env);
00768         createMultiQubit(&mqVerif, numQubits, env);
00769 
00770         // test qubit = |0> 
00771         for (qubit=0; qubit<numQubits; qubit++){
00772                 initStateZero(&mq);
00773                 initStateZero(&mqVerif);
00774                 outcome = measure(mq, qubit);
00775                 if (passed) passed = (outcome==0);
00776                 if (passed) passed = compareStates(mq, mqVerif, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00777         }
00778 
00779         // test qubit = |1> 
00780         for (qubit=0; qubit<numQubits; qubit++){
00781                 initStateOfSingleQubit(&mq, qubit, 1);
00782                 initStateOfSingleQubit(&mqVerif, qubit, 1);
00783                 outcome = measure(mq, qubit);
00784                 if (passed) passed = (outcome==1);
00785                 if (passed) passed = compareStates(mq, mqVerif, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00786         }
00787 
00788     // visual check:
00789         // test qubit = |+> 
00790     int nTrials=10;
00791     unsigned long int seedArray[] = {18239, 12391};
00792     int numSeeds = 2;
00793     QuESTSeedRandom(seedArray, numSeeds);
00794         for (qubit=0; qubit<numQubits; qubit++){
00795         if (env.rank==0) printf("\n%d trials: measure qubit %d when in state |+>:\n", nTrials, qubit);
00796         if (env.rank==0) printf("value of qubit = [");
00797         for (int i=0; i<nTrials; i++){
00798             initStatePlus(&mq);
00799             outcome = measure(mq, qubit);
00800             if (env.rank==0) printf(" %d", outcome);
00801         }
00802         if (env.rank==0) printf("]\n");
00803         }
00804         destroyMultiQubit(mq, env);
00805         destroyMultiQubit(mqVerif, env);
00806 
00807         return passed;
00808 }
00809 
00810 int test_measureWithStats(char testName[200]){
00811         int passed=1;
00812 
00813         int numQubits=4;
00814         MultiQubit mq, mqVerif;
00815         int qubit;
00816     int outcome;
00817     REAL prob;
00818 
00819         createMultiQubit(&mq, numQubits, env);
00820         createMultiQubit(&mqVerif, numQubits, env);
00821 
00822         // test qubit = |0> 
00823         for (qubit=0; qubit<numQubits; qubit++){
00824                 initStateZero(&mq);
00825                 initStateZero(&mqVerif);
00826         prob=0;
00827                 outcome = measureWithStats(mq, qubit, &prob);
00828                 if (passed) passed = (outcome==0);
00829                 if (passed) passed = compareReals(prob, 1, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00830                 if (passed) passed = compareStates(mq, mqVerif, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00831         }
00832 
00833         // test qubit = |1> 
00834         for (qubit=0; qubit<numQubits; qubit++){
00835                 initStateOfSingleQubit(&mq, qubit, 1);
00836                 initStateOfSingleQubit(&mqVerif, qubit, 1);
00837         prob=0;
00838                 outcome = measureWithStats(mq, qubit, &prob);
00839                 if (passed) passed = compareReals(prob, 1, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00840                 if (passed) passed = compareStates(mq, mqVerif, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00841         }
00842 
00843         // test qubit = |+> 
00844         for (qubit=0; qubit<numQubits; qubit++){
00845         initStatePlus(&mq);
00846         prob=0;
00847         outcome = measureWithStats(mq, qubit, &prob);
00848                 if (passed) passed = compareReals(prob, 0.5, COMPARE_PRECISION);
00849         }
00850         destroyMultiQubit(mq, env);
00851         destroyMultiQubit(mqVerif, env);
00852 
00853         return passed;
00854 }
00855 
00856 int main (int narg, char** varg) {
00857         initQuESTEnv(&env);
00858         reportQuESTEnv(env);
00859 
00860         int (*tests[NUM_TESTS])(char[200]) = {
00861                 test_controlledNot,
00862                 test_initStateZero,
00863                 test_initStatePlus,
00864                 test_sigmaX,
00865                 test_sigmaY,
00866                 test_sigmaZ,
00867                 test_hadamard,
00868                 test_sGate,
00869                 test_tGate,
00870                 test_controlledPhaseGate,
00871                 test_multiControlledPhaseGate,
00872                 test_compactUnitary,
00873         test_unitary,
00874                 test_controlledCompactUnitary,
00875         test_controlledUnitary,
00876         test_multiControlledUnitary,
00877                 test_findProbabilityOfOutcome,
00878                 test_collapseToOutcome,
00879         test_measure,
00880         test_measureWithStats,
00881         };
00882 
00883         char testNames[NUM_TESTS][200] = {
00884                 "controlledNot",
00885                 "initStateZero",
00886                 "initStatePlus",
00887                 "sigmaX",
00888                 "sigmaY",
00889                 "sigmaZ",
00890                 "hadamard",
00891                 "sGate",
00892                 "tGate",
00893                 "controlledPhaseGate",
00894                 "multiControlledPhaseGate",
00895                 "compactUnitary",
00896         "unitary",
00897                 "controlledCompactUnitary",
00898         "controlledUnitary",
00899         "multiControlledUnitary",
00900                 "findProbabilityOfOutcome",
00901                 "collapseToOutcome",
00902         "measure",
00903         "measureWithStats"
00904         };
00905         int passed=0;
00906         if (env.rank==0) printf("\nRunning unit tests\n");
00907         for (int i=0; i<NUM_TESTS; i++){
00908                 passed=(*tests[i])(testNames[i]);       
00909                 passed=syncQuESTSuccess(passed);
00910                 if (!passed){
00911                         if (env.rank==0) printf("!!! FAILED in test %d -- %s\n", i, testNames[i]);
00912                         closeQuESTEnv(env);
00913                         return 1;
00914                 } else if (env.rank==0) printf("Passed test %d -- %s\n", i, testNames[i]);
00915         }
00916         closeQuESTEnv(env);
00917 
00918         return 0;
00919 }
